thread.title: Back to the Future Day: Watch Jaws 19 trailer, hover board commercial
thread.title_full: Back to the Future Day: Watch Jaws 19 trailer, hover board commercial

title: Back to the Future Day: Watch Jaws 19 trailer, hover board commercial
text: Sponsored Links By Cox Media Group National Content Desk The future date traveled to in "Back to the Future II" has arrived, and while some of the predictions have come true, like Google glass and huge TV displays, others, sadly have not. But that hasn't stopped Universal from teasing the 19th "Jaws" movie. The company put together a trailer for the not-ever-released flick, posting it to YouTube . It has more than 1.7 million views since posting earlier this month. It also put together a "real" advertisement for the much-anticipated fake hover board. Pepsi also joined the commercial push with the Pepsi Perfect spot.
